title: ScancodeScript.vm, ScancodeScanScript.vm
text:
ScancodeScript.vm, ScancodeScanScript.vm

These templates create script files for downloading package sources and using ScanCode to do a "deep license scan"
for finding licenses, copyright information (statements, holders, authors)
and NOTICE files for each artifact within a project. See Experimental Scancode Integration.








Generating these scripts is an experimental feature and might be changed or removed in future versions without any notice.
